title: Design TimeDialationSimulator Concept
description: Create a design concept of the TimeDialationSimulator, including its user interface and overall functionality.

title: Research and Define TimeManipulation Algorithms
description: Thoroughly investigate existing time manipulation theories and develop algorithms to implement the desired functionality. This task includes gathering relevant literature, understanding their implications, and translating them into practical code.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Create the user interface for the TimeDialationSimulator, allowing users to interact with the device.

title: Implement Backend Functionality for Time Manipulation
description: Create the backend logic to handle time manipulation, based on the defined algorithms.

title: Integrate Database for User Data Storage
description: Design and implement a database to store user data, such as preferences and usage statistics.
dependencies: Implement Backend Functionality for Time Manipulation

title: Perform DevOps to Deploy and Test the System
description: Deploy the system, set up testing environments, and perform DevOps tasks as necessary.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Functionality for Time Manipulation
Integrate Database for User Data Storage

title: Conduct Quality Assurance Testing
description: Test the system to ensure functionality, usability, and compatibility.
dependencies: Perform DevOps to Deploy and Test the System

title: Address Security Concerns in TimeDialationSimulator
description: Identify and address potential security vulnerabilities in the system.
dependencies: Perform DevOps to Deploy and Test the System

title: Write Technical Documentation for TimeDialationSimulator
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation detailing the design, implementation, and usage of the TimeDialationSimulator.
dependencies: Implement Backend Functionality for Time Manipulation
Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
